description.en:
After 20 grueling years of hellish training, Juhyuk's stats are maxed-out, and he is ready to venture out into Olympus, a virtual reality game. 

His master's last dying wish is for Juhyuk to be the Ultimate Evil, the most powerful in Olympus. But when he steps out of the tutorial area, every player tries to kill him, and the game forces him to start over from Level 1! 

With these setbacks, Juhyuk will need all the help he can get to complete his SSS-rank quest and become the next Ultimate Evil.

altTitles.ja: キーチ!!

description.en: Left to himself at an early age in the slummiest parts of today’s Japan, Kiichi learns how to survive on his own. As a teenager, how can he adapt to a society whose rules he rejects? Unless he creates his own rules… Kiichi, a raw icon of strength and integrity, stands alone against the world’s injustice and becomes an unforgettable character.
description.pt-br: Deixado a si mesmo desde cedo nas partes mais pobres do Japão de hoje, Kiichi aprende como sobreviver por conta própria. Na adolescência, como ele pode se adaptar a uma sociedade cujas regras ele rejeita? A menos que ele crie suas próprias regras... Kiichi, um ícone bruto de força e integridade, se coloca sozinho contra a injustiça do mundo e se torna um personagem inesquecível.

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

altTitles.ja: デッドアカウント

description.en: Souji Enishiro, 15 years old (high school dropout), is a controversial streamer, "Aoringo," who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker, in reality, he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him, he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...

altTitles.ja: だれでも抱けるキミが好き
I like you who can have sex anyone.

altTitles.en: I Like You Who Can Have Sex With Anyone

altTitles.vi: Crush Của Tôi Là Một Đứa Lẳng Lơ

altTitles.es-la: Me Gustas tú, que Puedes tener Sexo con Cualquiera

altTitles.pt-br: Eu goste de você, que pode fazer sexo com qualquer um

description.en:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽
___
**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

**Alternative Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437)
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

altTitles.ja: 委員長とM子の百合

altTitles.en: Yuri Between the Class President and a Masochistic Girl
Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

altTitles.uk: Президентка Класу знайшла собі Слухняну Мазохістку

description.en: After her parents died, Sami gave up her life of fortune to live independently, doing odd jobs to make ends meet. When she starts to get involved with two of the most popular boys at her high school, Sami faces twists and turns -- Chan is her neighbor, and Pyojun makes her have conflicted feelings. Things get more complicated when she finds out that Chan has feelings for Pyojun as well! With her mom’s only keepsake in hand to keep her feet on the ground, Sami navigates obstacles that she wasn’t prepared for -- and aren’t even in her budget!

title.en: Honobono Isekai Tensei Days ~Level Counterstop, Item Mochikoshi! Watashi wa Saikyou Youjo Desu~

altTitles.ja: ほのぼの異世界転生デイズ ~レベルカンスト、アイテム持ち越し! 私は最強幼女です~

description.en: A young girl dies on Christmas day and is reincarnated into the world of her favorite game as her player character!
description.ja: 元・引きこもり女子高生のレニは大好きだったゲームの世界に転生してしまう。なんとその転生先はとってもキュートな最強幼女!? しかもカンストしたレベルやアイテムは前世から持ち越された”無敵”の状態で…。

altTitles.ja: 火花

description.en:
High school girl, Tomori, is dating an unstable boy named Inukai who is relentlessly violent toward Misato, a new transfer student. Refusing to listen to his friends or Tomori's pleas to stop, Inukai's obsession steadily escalates. Is this from hatred, or for some other reason?

Meeting, drifting apart, and inevitably drawn to each other again... Sparks fly when they cross.

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

altTitles.ja: 甘い生活

description.en:
The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. 
One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies 
(was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.

altTitles.en: Vagabond - Inoue Takehiko: The LAST Manga Exhibition - Catalog INOUENO: Mikazuki Edition
Exhibition Catalog INOUENO: Crescent Moon Edition

altTitles.ja: 図録「いのうえの」三日月篇

description.en:
An exhibition catalog that details the background of the "Inoue Takehiko: The LAST Manga Exhibition," held in the early summer of 2008 at the Ueno Royal Museum, through photos and text. It reveals why the exhibition was held at this time, and unveils Takehiko Inoue’s struggles and resolve.

The first of two exhibition catalogues (Crescent Moon and Full Moon).

title.en: Even a Replica Falls in Love

altTitles.ja: レプリカだって、恋をする。

altTitles.vi: Kể Cả Bản Sao Cũng Biết Yêu

description.en:
On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests.

On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon.
I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sonao Aikawa, and that is me.
I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different.
I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow,
I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original.
I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love.

A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.
description.ru:
В дни, когда она болеет, в дни, когда у нее нудная дневная работа, в дни, когда у нее очередные контрольные.

В дни, когда ей лень идти в школу, обращаются ко мне.
Я - удобный заменитель тела девушки по имени Сунао Аикава, и это я.
Может, я и выгляжу точно так же, но характер у меня немного другой.
Я не могу свободно выходить на улицу, не могу даже строить планы на завтра,
Я - копия, чья миссия - работать на оригинал.
Я должна была стать копией, но я влюбилась.

Очень красивая и немного загадочная "история любви", которая происходит в городке на берегу моря.
description.vi:
Vào những ngày mà cô ấy bị cảm, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có một công việc tẻ nhạt, vào những ngày mà cô ấy có bài kiểm tra thường xuyên.

Vào những ngày mà cô ấy quá lười để đi học, tôi được gọi ra.
Tôi là vật thay thế cho cơ thể của một cô gái tên là Sonao Aikawa, và đó chính là tôi.
Tôi có lẽ trông giống hệt họ, nhưng mà tính cách của tôi thì có hơi khác một chút.
Tôi không thể tự do ra ngoài được, tôi cũng chẳng thể nào lên kế hoạch cho ngày mai.
Tôi chỉ được coi là một bản sao thôi, nhưng tôi đã biết yêu.

Một "chuyện tình" rất trong sáng và có chút bí ẩn diễn ra tại một thị trấn ven biển.
description.es-la:
En los días en que se siente enferma, en los días en que tiene la trabajosa tarea de ser responsable del turno, en los días de exámenes regulares...
 
Cuando ella no tiene ganas de ir a la escuela, me llaman a mí. Soy el duplicado de Sonao Aikawa, una niña llamada Sonao, un sustituto conveniente. 

Aunque nuestra apariencia es completamente idéntica, nuestras personalidades son un poco diferentes. No puedo salir libremente ni planificar mis propios planes para el día siguiente. Soy una réplica cuyo propósito es trabajar en beneficio del original. Eso es lo que se suponía que era, pero me enamoré.

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn cùng lớp lạnh lùng sau ◯◯ năm...

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

title.en: Sono Hada no Atsusa wo Oboeteru

altTitles.ja: その肌の熱さをおぼえてる

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Hada no Atsusa o Oboeteru

description.en: “What would you do if I told you your partner that day was ‘me’?” Gen, a hairdresser, has long been in love with his older childhood friend, Koutarou, who likes his older brother, Kanade. One night, Gen spends the night at a hotel with a drunken Koutarou, bolstered by the thought that he might have a chance. However, Koutarou mistakenly thinks it was his older brother, Kanade, that he slept with. Gen’s used to being mistaken as Kanade, but they felt each other’s heat– to think he was mistaken as him even at night–. A devoted, younger, handsome hairdresser x a naturally airheaded, devilish, older, plain-faced boy’s one-sided, childhood love!
The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

altTitles.ja: 優劣の檻
ゲーセン少女と異文化交流

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Center Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu

altTitles.ja: Cultural Exchange With Game Center Girl

altTitles.en: Cultural Exchange With A Game Center Girl
Cross-Cultural Exchange With the Girl at the Arcade

altTitles.zh: 与游戏中心的少女异文化交流的故事

altTitles.zh-hk: 與遊戲中心的少女異文化交流的故事

altTitles.ja: ゲーセン少女

description.en: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん
Саша и ее одноклассник Отаку

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.ja: 青の花 器の森

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.en: The Blue Flowers, and the Ceramic Forest

altTitles.th: แต่งเติมลวดลายในรัก

description.en:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics…  
  
This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.
description.zh: 青之花 器之森漫画 ，小玉ユキ为大人献上的爱情故事， 陶瓷器与充满坡道的小镇、波佐见—— 对「器」怀着热爱的男女、 在这个小镇相遇…！？

description.en: A romance about two stubborn people that like each other.

title.en: Umineko When They Cry Episode Collection

altTitles.ja-ro: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Episode Collection

altTitles.ja: うみねこのなく頃に Episode collection

description.en: A series of Umineko When They Cry anthology manga published by Ichijinsha with 5 total volumes.

altTitles.ja: ショタおに

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

title.en: Yuri!!! on Ice - Sekai ni Hoshi ga Koboreru Kakuritsu (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: ユーリ!!! on ICE - 世界に星が零れる確率 (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Yuri!!! on Ice - The Probability the Stars Will Fall on the World (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Victor Nikiforov x Katsuki Yuuri

title.en: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.ja: 失恋したのでVtuberはじめたら年上のお姉さんにモテました

altTitles.ja-ro: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita

altTitles.en: I Was Heartbroken, So I Became A VTuber, But Then I Became Popular with the Older Ladies

altTitles.vi: Tuyệt vọng vì thất tình, tôi quyết định trở thành Vtuber vang danh

description.en:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment.

He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it’s a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one!

Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him…?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)
description.ja: ずっと想いを寄せていた部活の先輩に彼氏が出来た事を知った姫村優希は、ショックの余り先輩も自分も元々好きだったVtuberに自分がなってしまおうと貯金を叩いて機材を揃えてしまう。そして自分のバーチャル肉体をデザインしてもらったらなんとまさかの美少女3Dモデルで意図せず女の子になりきる事に!?

altTitles.ja: タダでは抱かれません

altTitles.en: I Won't Sleep with You for Free

altTitles.id: Aku Gak Nidurin Kamu Secara Cuma-cuma

altTitles.th: ชีวิตพลิกผัน ฉันขายตัวให้เพื่อน

description.en: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
description.id: Kirishima Miyako, mahasiswa di sebuah universitas khusus wanita dan calon guru, adalah seorang gadis miskin yang menjalani hidup serba hemat. Suatu hari, setelah ditraktir oleh teman gadisnya Nakano Yui, dia diajak untuk mengunjungi ke love hotel. Namun, dia menolaknya karena enggan untuk berhubungan seks dengan temannya. Sampai kemudian, Yui menawarkannya 30.000 yen jika Miyako menerima ajakannya. Sejak saat itu, Miyako melakukan lebih banyak "transaksi" dengan teman-temannya yang lain dari universitasnya!? Kisahpun Yuri tentang persahabatan, uang dan seks pun dimulai.
description.th: คิริชิมะ มิยาโกะ สาวมหาลัยยาจกที่ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นครู ได้จับพลัดจับผลูไปเข้าโรงแรมม่านรูดกับเพื่อนซี้นามว่า นากาโนะ ยุย โดยเธอขอมีเซ็กส์ด้วยโดยแลกกับเงิน 30000 เยน! แบบนี้มีหรือมิยาโกะจะไม่เอา!

altTitles.zh-ro: Xun Zhao Qian Shi Zhi Lu

description.en: The story is about a little Master, Gong Yao Ying, in order to accomplish the assigned tasks, she travels across the different periods. The stories are created after meeting with the famous historical figures.

title.en: Should I Make You a Nuclear Weapon?

altTitles.en: I Make Nuclear Weapons for You?

description.en:
Director Kim Jun of the Defense Science Research Institute faces a tragic end while protecting the ADD chip, a military secret of South Korea, during a terrorist attack in 2024.

However, he suddenly finds himself with an unexpected opportunity: he is reborn in the body of his friend Jeon Hyun-seung, who died in 1998!

Revived as Kim Jun, he discovers that he can access future technologies using the ADD chip engraved in his body.

"If you give me the chance... I’ll show you what I can create within three months."

Create the ultimate weapon to overcome the IMF crisis with future technology! Let me know if you need anything else!

altTitles.ja: 恋する鬼畜島

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Đường Ở Đảo Quái Dị

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

title.en: Radiance of Tribulation: The Old Man Leads the Way

altTitles.zh-ro: Po Jie Zhi Hui: Lao Da Ye Dai Fei

description.en: Together with the Demon Lord, he is reborn 60 years into the past. Witness how the dashing elder mercilessly crushes the Demon Lord, all while safeguarding his beloved.
description.zh: 和魔尊一起重生回到六十年前，看帅老头如何暴打魔尊，保护女友。

title.en: Yuri!!! on Ice - Nandemonai Taisetsuna Ichinichi (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: ユーリ!!! on ICE - なんでもない大切な一日 (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing : Katsuki Yuuri x Victor Nikiforov

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.ja: 回帰した公爵家の末息子は暗殺者

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title.en: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome

altTitles.ja: 英雄と魔女の転生ラブコメ

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Rabu Kome

altTitles.en: A Reincarnation Romantic Comedy of a Hero and a Witch

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Comédia Romântica de Reencarnação entre um Herói e uma Feiticeira

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình lãng mạn và hài hước của Anh Hùng và Phù Thủy chuyển sinh
Chuyện tình chuyển sinh hài hước của Anh hùng và Phù thuỷ

description.en: Choose the world or choose her. Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. However, that was a story of his past life. In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja: 世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。
description.vi:
Shiraishi Godou, một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường đang có một "Bí mật". Đó là cậu vẫn còn ký ức của tiền thế.
Ở một thế giới khác, Godou đã từng là "Anh hùng" giải cứu nhân loại. Tuy là vậy, nhưng đó là chuyện của tiền thế. Ở thế giới hiện tại, cậu chắc là đang trải qua quãng đời học sinh bình thường, vậy mà sự xuất hiện của cô thiếu nữ vừa chuyển trường đến. Shiina Mai đã làm những ngày yên bình của cậu hoàn toàn thay đổi
description.pt-br: O estudante comum de ensino médio Shiraishi Godo guardava um "segredo", ele possuía memórias de uma vida passada. Em um mundo diferente deste, ele foi um "herói" que salvou a humanidade. Mas isso era uma história de sua vida passada. Nesta vida, Godo deveria ter uma vida escolar comum. Isso até a chegada da nova aluna Mai Shiina, que virou tudo de cabeça para baixo. Ela não era apenas uma aluna transferida. Mai era a reencarnação de Celis, a Feiticeira da Calamidade, sua mortal inimiga de vidas passadas. E ela estava lá, não por vingança, mas por algo mais — algo que mudaria o curso da vida de Godo mais uma vez. Agora, ele deve navegar pelas complexidades de suas memórias reencarnadas, sua crescente conexão com Mai e a escolha impossível entre uma vida pacífica e uma cheia de caos mágico.

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

description.en:
A woman identical to me appears in my dreams, crying.  

"Who are you?"  

For three years, Shunaelle, the Demon King of the North, has been haunted by the same dream, growing curious about the woman and deciding to track her down.  

The truth? She’s a fragment of Shunaelle’s soul, cast away into the human realm.  

When Shunaelle tries to absorb the fragment back into herself, the woman resists.  

『I don’t want to be absorbed!』  

Instead, she makes a plea:  
If you want me back, live my life—a life filled with regret—and make it right.

Yeon Hojeong, the first to unite the dark factions as the leader of the Unorthodox Faction, collaborates with the Orthodox Faction to overcome the chaos of the Three Cults. However, he meets an untimely end, entangled in the schemes of the Murim Alliance Leader.

"This really is my home!"

When he opens his eyes, he finds himself in the prestigious and once-destroyed Yeon Clan, a place he never forgot.

"I won’t make a mistake this time. Never again."

Determined to prevent the fall of his family and the future upheaval caused by the Three Cults, he embarks on a relentless journey! This is the struggle of Yeon Hojeong, the eldest son, to unite the martial world.
description.fr:
Yeon Hojeong, le premier à unir les factions obscures en tant que chef de la faction peu orthodoxe, collabore avec la faction orthodoxe pour surmonter le chaos des Trois Cultes. Cependant, il connaît une fin prématurée, empêtré dans les plans du chef de l'Alliance Murim.

"C'est vraiment chez moi !"

Lorsqu'il ouvre les yeux, il se retrouve dans le prestigieux clan Yeon, autrefois détruit, un endroit qu'il n'a jamais oublié.

"Je ne commettrai pas d'erreur cette fois. Plus jamais."

Déterminé à empêcher la chute de sa famille et les futurs bouleversements provoqués par les Trois Cultes, il se lance dans un voyage sans relâche ! C'est la lutte de Yeon Hojeong, le fils aîné, pour unifier le monde martial.

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja: あずみ
少女杀手阿墨
百人斩少女

description.en:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Website](http://www.yu-koyama.com)  
- [Live-Action Movie on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6166)  
- [Live-Action Movie (sequel) on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6167)

altTitles.ja: ギルデッド・セブン

description.en: Historical Action about a police officer hunting down the "La Llorona" mexican crime cartel. After catching a bunch of high-ranking members, suddenly a Yellowstone volcano errupts & the cop time-leaps to the 19th wild west a few days after Lincoln got assassinated. He steps into a gruesome scene of native americans getting slaughtered. But suddenly the supposedly dead Abrahalm Lincoln appears and kills the attackers.

title.en: Mythical Invasion: I Slay Gods on Earth

altTitles.zh: 神话入侵：我在地球斩神明

altTitles.zh-ro: Shenhua Ruqin: Wo Zai Diqiu Zhan Shenming

altTitles.en: Myth Invasion: I Kill Gods on Earth

description.en: The descent of the deities had ushered the invasion of Earth, eventually leading to the collapse of human civilisation! Guardian Deity Lin Fang has returned back to three months before the descent of the deities. In this life, he must lead humanity, charged with the might of the nation, to wage war against the deities!
description.zh: 神明降临，入侵地球，人类文明最终走向灭亡！ 守护神林凡重回神明降临三月前，这一世，定要带领人类以举国之力迎战神明！

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

description.en:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

title.en: Zero no Majutsushi - S-Rank Yuusha Party o Zenryoku de Support Shiteita no ni Tsuihousareta Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Party Kyoufushou ni Natta no de Zenryoku de Ohitori-sama Musou o Hajimeru Koto ni Shimashita

altTitles.ja: ゼロの魔術師～Sランク勇者パーティを全力でサポートしていたのに追放された最強の魔術師はパーティ恐怖症になったので全力でお一人様無双を始める事にしました～@COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Zero no Majutsushi - S-Rank Yuusha Party wo Zenryoku de Support Shiteita no ni Tsuihousareta Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Party Kyoufushou ni Natta no de Zenryoku de Ohitori-sama Musou wo Hajimeru Koto ni Shimashita

altTitles.en: Zero Magician - I Was Supporting the S-Rank Hero Party with All My Might. The Strongest Magician Who Was Exiled Developed a Fear of Parties. I Decided to Put All My Effort into Making Each Person Unique.

description.en:
Rood is a magician who was a member of an S-Rank party until he was banished from the party due to the selfish reasons of Toran, the hero. After being betrayed by his comrades, the heartbroken Rood abandoned the town he had been staying in until then, and left on a journey to the neighboring country, Roland Empire, looking to start over in a new land.

(Source: Corona EX)
description.ja:
Sランクパーティ所属の魔術師・ルードは、勇者・トランの身勝手な理由でパーティから追放されてしまう。
仲間に裏切られ傷心のルードは今まで滞在していた街を捨て、新天地を求めて隣国・ローランド帝国領へ旅へ出た。
description.es-la:
Un día, Rood, un mago que pertenece al grupo de héroes de rango S "Golden Rose", es expulsado del grupo por razones irrazonables.
Rood había dedicado toda su vida a apoyar al partido, pero debido a la autoridad del héroe, incluso su registro de aventurero fue cancelado.
Rood intenta volver a hacer realidad su sueño de ser un aventurero, pero el trauma del exilio le ha hecho tener miedo a los grupos Pero luego se da cuenta: "¿Quizás sea mejor emprender una aventura solo?

title.en: Kyoukai Meikyuu to Ikai no Majutsushi

altTitles.ja: 境界迷宮と異界の魔術師

altTitles.en: Boundary Labyrinth and the Foreign Magician

altTitles.zh: 境界迷宫与异界魔术师

altTitles.ru: Пограничный лабиринт и маг из другого мира

altTitles.zh-hk: 境界迷宮與異界魔術師

description.en: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother, he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa, placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO, and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore, who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world, had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City, Termuilles.
description.ja: 貴族の庶子に生まれ、兄弟に虐げられてきた少年・テオドールは、事故で死にかけた際に【前世の記憶】を取り戻す。それは前世――“霧島景久”として、この世界そっくりのVRMMOゲーム『Break Force online』を【テオドール】という名のキャラでプレイし《境界迷宮》に挑んでいた記憶であった。そして、記憶だけではなく、かつてゲーム中で身につけていた“魔法スキル”をも取り戻した少年は、従者の少女・グレイスと共に、この世界の《境界迷宮》がある都市タームウィルズに向かうのだった。

altTitles.en: A Classmate is a Princess Knight!
The Princess Knight is a Classmate!

altTitles.ja: 姫騎士がクラスメート! THE COMIC

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主騎士是我的同班同學! THE COMIC

description.en:
After he and his entire class died on a field trip, Odamori accepts a job offer from a mysterious man to be reincarnated. 

However, his new job turns out to be that of a Slavemancer, with the power to dominate the minds of others and turn them into his toys. Soon, however his evil actions lead to a Princess Knight (who turns out to be one of his previous, more popular classmates) being dispatched to apprehend him. 

But Odamori, of course, has something different planned for their reunion...!
description.pt: Depois que ele e toda a sua classe morreram em uma viagem escolar, Odamori aceita uma oferta de um misterioso homem de ser reencarnado. No entanto o seu novo trabalho acaba por ser o de um 'Slavemancer' com o poder de dominar as mentes dos outros e transformá-los em seus brinquedos, que ele alegremente aceita. Logo no entanto suas mÁs ações levam a uma princesa guerreira (que acaba por ser um de seus anteriores colegas mais populares) que está sendo enviada para prendê-lo. Mas Odamori, claro, tem algo diferente planejado para a sua reunião.
description.pt-br: Depois que ele e toda a sua classe morreram em uma viagem escolar, Odamori aceita uma oferta de um misterioso homem de ser reencarnado. No entanto o seu novo trabalho acaba por ser o de um 'Slavemancer' com o poder de dominar as mentes dos outros e transformá-los em seus brinquedos, que ele alegremente aceita. Logo no entanto suas mÁs ações levam a uma princesa guerreira (que acaba por ser um de seus anteriores colegas mais populares) que está sendo enviada para prendê-lo. Mas Odamori, claro, tem algo diferente planejado para a sua reunião.

title.en: Isekai Sniper wa Onna Senshi no Mofumofu Aigan Doubutsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界狙撃手は女戦士のモフモフ愛玩動物

altTitles.en: A Sniper From Another World is Turned Into The Female Warrior's Fluffy Pet
Another World Sniper is Female Warrior's Mof-Moffy Pet

description.en: A gun otaku dies after toying with a homemade pistol that explodes in his face. In the afterlife, he is told that he will be reincarnated into another world. When the otaku wakes up, he finds that he is no longer human - he’s now just some little furry thing. Near death, he comes across a beautiful warrior, who decides to take care of him because he’s fluffy. However, things take a turn when he finds out that firearms exist in this world?
description.ja: 非モテで金のない銃マニアの31歳のオッサンが異世界転生！でも変なモフモフのぬいぐるみっぽいモンスターに転生していた!?突如現れた女戦士と出会い一緒に冒険することに…!?銃マニアだった知識が異世界で役に立つ!?モフモフ異世界転生ファンタジー！

altTitles.th: เดอะ นิวเกท

altTitles.ja: ザ・ニュー・ゲート

description.az: "The New Gate" adlı onlayn oyunun ölüm oyununa çevrilməsi nəticəsində on minlərlə oyunçu bu oyunda ilişib qalır. Lakin ən güclü və keçmiş oyunçulardan biri olan Şinin səyləri nəticəsində bütün oyunçular oyundan çıxa bilirlər. Lakin Şin ən sonuncu bossu məğlub edib hər kəsi azad edəndə qəribə işıq görür və qəflətən özünü 500 il gələcəkdəki oyun dünyasında tapır.
description.en:
The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players.

Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game’s final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!

Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!
description.es: "THE NEW GATE", un juego online que se había convertido en un juego de la muerte, ahora estaba liberando a las decenas de miles de jugadores que habían sido arrastrados, gracias a los esfuerzos de Shin, uno de los jugadores más antiguos. Pero después de haber derrotado al último jefe y liberado a todos, fue tragado por una luz extraña y se encontró dentro del mundo del juego 500 años en el futuro.
description.ja:
数万人を巻き込んでデスゲームと化したオンラインゲーム「THE NEW GATE（ザ・ニューゲート）」は、最古参プレイヤー・シンの活躍によりついに解放のときを迎えようとしていた。しかし最後のボスを倒し脱出することができたと思った瞬間、
突如未知の光を浴び、500年後のゲーム世界に飛ばされてしまう！最強プレイヤーの新たなる無双バトル伝説開幕！

[Video Preview](https://youtu.be/YyB2MNkrpfw)
description.ru: «Новые Врата» — смертельная игра, которая не отпускает десятки тысяч игроков. Шин — как раз один из таких геймеров. Он побеждает последнего босса и освобождает всех людей из смертельной ловушки, но самого его охватывает яркий свет и он переносится на 500 лет вперед.
description.th:
[THE NEW GATE] เกมแนว VRMMO-RPG
ซึ่งกลายเป็นเดธเกมนั้นได้มาถึงช่วงเวลา
แห่งการปลดปล่อย
เพราะความพยายามของเพลเยอร์ (ผู้เล่น)
ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดนามว่า ชิน
ทว่า ทันทีที่เขาโค่นมอนสเตอร์ตัวสุดท้ายลง
อยู่ๆ ประตูที่อยู่ด้านในสุดก็เปิดออก และทำให้ชิน
ซึ่งอาบแสงปริศนาที่สาดส่องเข้ามาหมดสติไป—
เมื่อเขาลืมตาตื่นขึ้นมาอีกครั้ง ก็ปรากฏภาพ
ของโลกของ [THE NEW GATE]
ที่กลายเป็นของจริงขึ้นมา...!!
description.tr: "The New Gate", oyuncularını tuzağa düşüren ve bir ölüm oyununa dönüşen çevrimiçi bir oyundur ve en güçlü oyunculardan biri olan Shin'in çabaları sayesinde oyunu sürüklenen binlerce oyuncuyu serbest bırakmaktadır. Ancak son patronu yendikten ve herkesi özgür bıraktıktan sonra, tuhaf bir ışık tarafından yutulmuş ve kendini oyun dünyasında 500 yıl sonrasında, oradan çıkamayan bir durumda bulmuştur.
description.es-la: "THE NEW GATE", un juego online que se había convertido en un juego de la muerte, ahora estaba liberando a las decenas de miles de jugadores que habían sido arrastrados, gracias a los esfuerzos de Shin, uno de los jugadores más antiguos. Pero después de haber derrotado al último jefe y liberado a todos, fue tragado por una luz extraña y se encontró dentro del mundo del juego 500 años en el futuro.
